Hi Jorn,

unfortunately, I don't have the time to follow the current discussions 
and debates about this topic right now. However, I somehow started a 
discussion re. that topic some time ago. You may have a look at this 
thread at answers.semanticweb.com, which also includes some links to 
parallel and related discussions here at rest-discuss:

http://answers.semanticweb.com/questions/2763/the-relation-of-linked-datasemantic-web-to-rest

Cheers,


Bo


On 4/3/2012 10:29 AM, Jorn Wildt wrote:
> It seems like there is an ongoing debate/mismatch/battle/whatever
> between REST and Linked Data (if I am interpreting various Tweets
> correct). Could anyone share a link to something that can enlighten me
> on what this is about?
>
> Thanks, Jï¿½rn
